Actually, I had compared with the Japanese Wikipedia articles...  
Anyways,=
 here's my latest edit on the Kondo article:

"According to Tani Tateki (18=
37 - 1911) of the Tosa-Han, Kondo was properly executed 
by the new governm=
ent (formed mostly by the samurai of the Choshu-Han and the 
Satsuma-Han) a=
s a direct result of being accused of the murder of Sakamoto Ryoma. Even 
a=
fter Imai Nobuo's confession in 1870, Tani insisted that Kondo was not fals=
ely accused 
for Sakamoto's murder."


~Seven
